content.prompt: Which of the following claims is supported by the arguments made by both Rossinow and Berman?

choices.label: Evangelical support for liberal social policies expanded during the 1980s.
Supporters of the Democratic Party pushed initiatives to increase taxes.
Conservative supporters wanted Reagan to expand the power of the federal government.
The influence of cultural debates persisted throughout politics in the 1980s.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
